column1: back of a length, off stump line, he is back and across and defending
good length, hint of shape back, off stump line, he defends solidly getting in behind it
back of a length, outside off, he punches firmly off the back foot but straight to the man at cover
good length, shaping back into off, he defends from the crease off the inside half of the bat to forward square
fuller length, pushed across the left-hander, but too wide according to the umpire. That was a tough call. It wasn't outside the guideline
good length, shaping back just outside off, he defends with the full face getting in behind it
shorter and wider, he's back and cutting firmly but straight to point
very full and pushed way wide of off and rightly called wide
126kph, good length across him, fifth stump line, he defends on the front foot
good length, outside off, he pushes on the front foot to mid off
136kph, good length across the left-hander, he presses forward and defends with a solid top hand to mid off
fuller outside off, he drives but mis-times it straight to mid off
133kph, fuller on middle and off, he hangs in the crease and works this with the wrists to the gap wide of mid on to get off the mark
136kph, good length, off stump line, he defends comfortably to cover
good length, top of middle, he works this off the front foot to midwicket
back of a length, shortest ball so far, he's caught on the crease pushing awkwardly off the inside half of the bat to midwicket
shorter on the hip, he clips this neatly off the back foot but straight to midwicket
fuller outside off, he drives on the up but doesn't time it purely, straight to mid off
134kph, fuller length outside off, he jabs a drive with the bottom hand to mid off
fuller length outside off, he drives on the up but can't beat mid off
he advances down the track and launches this straight over the bowler's head! What a shot! Great thinking to skip down and change the length. He just hit straight through the line and flushed it.
good length, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot to cover
back of a length, fourth stump line, no swing, he defends on the back foot to cover
fuller and wider, he drives nicely but smacks it straight to the man at cover-point
back of a length outside off, he is squared up defending to a wide and deep gully
shorter length, leg stump line, he's back and working this to the gap at midwicket, he wants two but it's not on as Finch runs from mid on to cut it off
back of a length, he's back and defending with an open face to the gully but can't get it past the man
he drives from the crease and gets a thick edge that runs along the ground safely to third man
crunch! He hammers a square drive on the up through cover-point with authority! It was not a half-volley, fractionally wide but he nailed it
Two in two! Not that short but he swivels quickly and pulls off a thick bottom edge but timed it well enough behind square and it raced away
good length, fourth stump line, he defends from the crease back to the bowler
short ball cracked over forward square! Too easy this one. Shortest ball of the match and on this slow wicket it sat up and Shan Masood smacked a pull shot elegantly over forward square leg.
140kph, good length on off, he defends solidly on the front foot
short ball and he is quick onto the back foot pulling beautifully behind square with great control!
short length outside off, he's up on his toes and defending to point
137kph, shorter and wider of off, he cracks a cut shot and Maxwell makes a superb diving save at point! Can't prevent a single but saves the boundary
good length angled into off, he gets a slight leading edge as he tries to work to leg, goes back to the bowler along the ground
angled into off again, he waits and tucks this to midwicket
tossed up on off, he reaches forward and defends
drifting into leg, he turns the face and works it to midwicket
looped up outside off, he drives with control to long off for a single
flatter and quicker on off, he steps forward and defends
looped up on middle, he works it against the turn but can't beat the man at midwicket
shorter length, he's back and giving room, cuts very firmly but straight to cover-point in the circle
drifting down the leg side and called wide
tossed up on middle, he drives firmly inside out to deep long off
drifting into leg, he tucks this against the angle to square leg
sliding onto middle, he drives back to the bowler
sliding into leg, he turns this fine to short fine leg
tossed up outside off, he drives in the air for a short way but safely to long off
fuller on off, he pushes this on the front foot off the thick inside edge to the gap at midwicket
good length, off stump, hint of turn, he's back and rushed in defence
drifting into middle, he tucks this to the gap at midwicket
drifting into middle, full, he works this against the turn to deep midwicket

caught and bowled! Beautifully bowled from Lyon. He looped it up outside off, he skips down the track and doesn't get to the pitch, tries to drive and hits a waist high return catch to Lyon and he does not drop those!
edged closing the face and it's just wide of the diving Handscomb at slip! Another great delivery not rewarded, it runs for two to third man
fuller on middle, he defends on the front foot
tossed up outside off, he drives straight back to the bowler
fuller and he tries to launch down the ground, he mistimes it along the ground to straight mid on for one
drifting into leg, he works this straight to midwicket
tossed up outside off, he drives in the air wide of cover and wide of long off and they get a couple
tossed up on middle, he defends with soft hands
drifting into middle, he just pushes this gently into midwicket
tossed up outside off, he reaches out and slices a drive to point
drifting into leg, he clips this off his pads behind square to the sweeper in the deep
good length outside off, he defends on the front foot to cover
drifting into leg, he clips this on the front foot to long on
fuller, on middle, he pushes this on the front foot against the little turn to midwicket
flatter and shorter on middle, he's back and working this behind square to the man in the deep
tossed up, he drives straight to cover
looped up outside off, he drives nicely with control to long off
flatter and slightly shorter, he stands up in the crease and punches this to long off
flatter on leg, he works this straight to midwicket
sweeps fine from off stump, gets it fine of the man inside the circle and it runs away to the rope!
82kph, leg break, not much turn, on middle, he defends with the turn to midwicket

beaten, it slides through lower outside off as he tries to cut off the back foot. Carey removes the bails and appeals for a stumping? This is odd. He thinks Masood lifted his foot. They are checking upstairs but both feet are in. Odd move to send this upstairs. Not out.
tossed up on leg, he whips this through square leg to the man in the deep
top spinner, full outside off, he drives to mid off but can't beat him
shorter length, he cuts firmly to through point for two
tossed up outside off, he defends on the front foot to cover
he skips down and launches this down the ground just clearing mid off who is up in the circle!
fuller on off, he is forward and defending
shorter length, he's back and punching this to long off
tossed up outside off, he's happy to let this go
full on leg, he glances this to wide fine leg
wrong un outside leg, he doesn't pick it, tries to work square and gets a leading edge
flatter on leg, he clips this firmly to deep forward square for one
slid through on leg, he's back and pushing this with soft hands to the gap at midwicket and they pinch a tight one
full almost a yorker on leg, he jams it out to midwicket
shorter length, he's back and punching it back to the bowler
shorter length, he's back and cutting hard but straight to point
fuller on off, he reaches forward and works it wide of midwicket, he wants one but Maxwell pounces to cut it off
tossed up, he steps forward to defend
floated up outside off, he drives calmly to long off
flatter on off, he's back and working with the turn to midwicket
full toss, but he mistimes it off the thick inside edge to the gap at midwicket
on leg stump, he works this forward of square to the sweeper in the deep
full on middle, whipped firmly to the man at deep forward square
full outside leg, he glances this on the front foot behind square for a single
good length on off, he is back and tucking this with the angle through square leg to the sweeper
shorter outside off, he rides the bounce and guides this past gully to wide third man
short lifter than bounces slowly off the surface, he gets on top of the bounce and works it to the gap at square leg
full outside off, driven to deep cover
worked down the ground to long-on
edged through the vacant slip away, nicely googly found the edge and just too thick for Carey
comes forward and drives it to cover
short of length delivery on the leg stump. He pulls it to deep square-leg for three runs
beats him with a ripper! Outside off and the away movement beats the outside edge
comes forwars and defends it to cover
comes forward and drives it to mid-off for a single
Back of a length, outside off stump down the track driving,mis-timed to mid on for no runs.
bit of an edge, down to deep midwicket
Off break length ball, off stump no foot movement, to short third man for 1 run
length ball, outside off  played towards long on for a 1 run
length ball, outside off stump, to short extra cover for no runs
Leg spinner length ball, outside off stump to deep cover for 1 run
Leg spinner half volley, to leg on the front foot, to short mid for no runs
comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
drives it to long-off against the turn
defends it back to the bowler
pushes it to the leg side for a single
turns it behind square for a couple
steps down the track and flicks it to midwicket
begins with a fuller ball outside the off stump. He drives it to sweeper cover
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. He lets the ball come to him and deftly flicks it to midwicket for a single
wide down the leg side
drives it to sweeper cover for a single
round the wicket, clipped into midwicket
clubbed down the ground to long-on
pushed with a straight bat into midwicket
fired across outside off, beats the outside edge as he drives. A Jadhav delivery!
tucked into midwicket
round the wicket, full outside off, driven to deep cover
round the wicket, punched sweetly into the leg side but finds mid-on
clubbed straight down the ground! All the way...picked the slower ball, back of a length, and swung through the line sending it back over the bowler's head
fuller delivery, pushed to mid-on
bangs in a short ball outside off, he swings and misses with his pull and there's a small query about an edge from Carey
good length outside off, opens the face and steers to third man
this delivery stops a little in the pitch but he's able to bunt it down the ground
round the wicket, full at the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
driven through the off side to long-off
on the stumps, driven to long-off
angled into the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
whipped off the pads and picks out square leg
finds the gap this time to deep square
good length wide of off, he tries to cut but chops it off the bottom edge to backward point

he holes out to mid off! Caught by Finch running back! This was a strange shot straight after drinks. It was a length ball, he tried to club this down the ground from the crease, he miscued slicing this high straight of mid off but he hit it straight up, Finch ran back a touch and took the catch well.
length ball into leg, he clips this off the hip neatly through square leg to the sweeper
shorter length outside off, he's jumping back and across and angling this through gully, Maxwell races to his left but can't prevent the single
full, angled into middle, he whips this with the angle through square leg to the sweeper

edged but it doesn't carry to the keeper! It was a good length, Malik pushed forward and opened the face to run it to third man, gets a thin edge, a clear edge but it falls short of Carey diving forward to his right
tossed up, he skips down and drives to long off
beaten by a round arm delivery from around the wicket, sliding on past the outside edge
quicker and flatter, he defends on the front foot
nearly caught at wide long off! He charges and slices it as it goes across on the angled, it bends away from Lyon at long off running to his left and just bounces wide for four!
charges and smears this with the turn over deep forward square! What a strike to clear the fence!

Bowled him! Brilliant come back. Stays around the wicket, delivers a good length, drifting across with the angle, he plays for turn trying to drive to long on, it slides past the edge and hits the top of off!
good length, angled into off, he covers up in defence
shorter outside off, he sits back and opens the face running it to third man for one
fuller length, on off, he sits back and defends with the angle to midwicket
135kph, very full outside off, he drives inside out along the ground to deep cover
full outside off, he drives neatly placing it through cover-point to the sweeper
short ball, 134kph, skids on a touch, he swivels and pulls to fine leg, mistiming it but rotating the strike
round arm, slung into off, he reaches out and defends
slings this one down the leg side and it's called wide
slower on middle, he dabs this towards midwicket and wants one but it's not on
slight leading edge playing back to a ball on middle but it falls safe
shorter length, he's back and punching firmly past Maxwell to long off
fuller, wide of off, he drives fluently and firmly to deep cover-point
deceived by some spin, he closed the face, gets an edge but it's safe running fine of short third man and they get a couple. Beautifully bowled by Maxwell to slow that up and get it to grip
short wrong un, he's back and slapping a low bouncing ball to long on
full wrong un, he tries to paddle sweep but gets it straight to the man
edged and just past Khawaja at slip! Dropped chance! It was tough. Brilliant wrong un, got a thick edge that went low and quick and brushed Khawaja's left hand but it ran away for four!
googly again, he's squared up in defence
shorter outside off, he's back and punching down to long off
short wrong un, he goes leg side and gives room to slap this to deep cover-point
round arm, slung in flat and quick, he backs away and cuts hard through point and times it so well it beats the man on the rope!
tossed up outside off, he drives firmly to Richardson at deep cover-point
reverse sweep from outside leg, straight to backward point
round arm, drifting into leg stump, he sits back and tucks this through square leg
looped up wide of off, he square drives firmly to deep cover-point
shorter length, he's back and punching this down to long off
leg break on leg, he's back and pushing this to midwicket
wrong un outside off, he premeditates and paddle sweeps behind square for a single
good length, he skips down and drives very hard straight to long off for one
shorter leg break on middle, he's back and forcing this down to long on
shorter wrong un, he cuts firmly but can't beat Marsh at backward point
leg break outside leg stump, he clips this behind square for a single
he skips down and works this firmly to the gap at deep midwicket and they run an easy two
darted through quicker, cramping him for room, he punches off the back foot to cover
shorter length on leg, he sits back and punches to long on
round arm outside off, he glides a late cut to short third man but can't rotate the strike
tossed up outside off, he pushes on the front foot straight to cover
brilliantly placed cut shot behind point! It was fractionally short and wide and he waited and cut it just past Finch at backward point and it raced away
good length on off, he pushes on the front foot to mid on in the circle
slower ball, back of a length, on leg, it comes off the pad and runs fine for a leg bye
edged but no slip in and it races to fine third man! It was a good length wide of off, he drives on the up and edge this but it's well wide of the keeper and races away
fuller on middle, he drives along the ground through mid on for one
another edge just wide of Carey! Full blooded drive with no footwork, he gets a thick edge that would have gone to a second slip but no slip in place it runs to fine third man again!
shorter length, he pulls hard, not quite timing it but he gets it into the gap at deep midwicket for two
135kph, good length, he drives and gets a thick edge that flies safely towards third man for a single
half-volley, he crunches a drive hard but straight to cover
another thick edge flies fine of third man, Coulter-Nile dives but can't save it! It was angled across, he drives but gets a thick edge and again gets rewarded with four
full and wide, he drives square to deep cover-point
another edge for four! Crazy stuff this! It was full angled wide again, he slices a drive and edged this fine of third man again! Unbelievable. Four times in two overs

caught at backward point! Finally a sliced edge goes to hand! It was a slower ball angled across, he slices a square drive off the thick edge checking the shot, it flies to Stoinis at backward point who holds on with both hands moving to his right
good length into middle and leg, he's back and tucking this behind square for a single
shorter length, he charges down the track and swings and misses
beaten by a good length, Imad tried to angle this with an open face to third man but it went past the edge
hammered through cover! Shorter length, he gives room and flat bats it past cover and it races to the rope
fuller on middle, he mistimes a drive to mid on and can't beat the man
he backs away, Coulter-Nile follows and he slices a cut shot off a thick edge to third man to retain the strike
full outside off, he plays a checked slog sweep, times it well but straight to deep midwicket on the bounce
full outside off, he shuffles out and punches a drive with the bottom hand to long on
slog sweep over deep square! What a shot! He got down on one knee and slog sweeps this over deep square! The crack of the bat was amazing
full outside off, he steps across and slog this through square leg to the vacant leg side field for a couple more
full outside off, he steps outside off, and whips but mistimes it wide of mid on
full outside off, he drives to mid off and takes one
good length on off, he sits back and tucks this behind square
shorter length, he frees the arms and smacks this wide of mid off! What a strike. He backed away and smoked this into the gap!
short ball muscled over mid off again! Brilliant from Imad. Short ball and he clubbed it over mid off
full outside off, it's in the slot, he smashes this straight of mid off but Finch makes a great save
length slower ball, he pulls this behind square for one

he picks the slower ball and flicks this wide of long on! What a shot to finish! Slower ball, he picked it up and flicked it into the gap wide of long on and straight of deep midwicket. Maxwell tried gallantly but couldn't get there.
hint of swing first up, full outside off, Khawaja presses forward and gets a controlled outside edge to third man
full and straight, defended to mid-on
good length outside off, pushed square towards point
fuller, at off stump, some shape in and met with a straight bat that finds mid-off
runs it to third man off a thickish outside edge, all along the ground
good length outside off, defended solidly to the off side
full at off stump, pushed to mid-off
length ball outside off, driven to the covers without much timing
back of a length at off stump, defended to the covers
works a straight delivery into midwicket
good length outside off, Khawaja keen to get forward and drives to the covers
appeal for lbw as Khawaja plays across the line, sneaks between inside edge and clips the top of the back pad
back of a length at middle and off, defended firmly to cover
a sharp short delivery on leg stump, that does him for pace which is a good effort on this pitch and it comes off the glove as Finch pulls
that's an elegant flick from the in-form Khawaja, uses the angle coming into him and flicks this from around off stump through square leg
drives on the up to mid-off
that's a beauty which beats the outside edge, perfect line outside off, zips to the keeper
flicks a slightly straighter delivery to mid-on
good delivery, full length and shapes back at Finch - that's where's vulnerable to being bowled or lbw - pushed towards mid-on
full outside off, driven to the right of mid-off
short of a length, again it shapes back at Finch, pushed towards mid-on for a tight(ish) single
opens the face and steers a length delivery down to third man
nips back from short of a length, takes the top of the pad
flicks a straight delivery down to long leg
good length at the stumps, defended into midwicket
pushed into the covers
well bowled, tight to the stumps, no width for Finch to work with and defends to the bowler
that's a very sweet piece of timing from the captain, flicked off the pads through midwicket
short of a length at middle and off, played into midwicket with a straight bat
a fuller delivery and it's pumped straight down the ground, back over Amir's head
now it's Khawaja's turn to bring out the drive, but he finds the man at square cover
that's a top shot! Just back of a length outside off, Finch stands tall and drives it backward of square, wide of third man
too straight, shapes into the pads and glances down the leg side but he gets away with it
back of a length, straight, defended to mid-on
hops across the crease and tucks a back-of-a-length delivery into midwicket
short of a length outside off, strongly square cut towards point where Imam lets it through
round the wicket, full outside off, driven powerfully to cover where Haris does well to intercept
tucks a straight delivery off the stumps to deep midwicket
over the wicket, skids one over the top edge as Khawaja aims to play square. Bowled quickly
tucked through midwicket for another brace
fuller outside off, that's a lovely bit of touch from Khawaja as he opens the face, also using Imad's pace to his advantage
that's barely pitched on the cut strip, fired quick and wide outside off
loses his line again, round the wicket, full on the toes and it's clipped to long leg
round the wicket, full outside off, driven to cover
touch straighter, he finds mid-off this time
whipped from around off stump to deep square
back of a length at off stump, punched to cover
off the back foot to mid-off
nips back from short of a length and brings an lbw appeal but that looked high
played down the ground
spears this down the leg side, called wide
defended to the on side, very full
pushes a full delivery back to the bowler
presses forward and this takes an inside edge backward of square
full outside off, jabbed to the on side, Imad gets across
full, width outside off, he drives and gets a bottom edge through the keeper's legs
that's a thumping shot! Strides forward into a length delivery and lofts it over wide mid-on...not perfectly timed, but had the legs
full and straight, defended to midwicket
touch shorter, worked with a closed face to deep square
gets forward an drives to cover
that's a bit of a heave from Khawaja, pulling across the line of what was only just a back-of-a-length delivery, runs away through backward square leg
repeats the shot, this time it goes finer to short fine leg
nearly drags on! Aiming to play square into the off side with a horizontal bat and gets a bottom edge into his boot. Risky
that's better, plays a full delivery with a straight bat through mid-on
looks to guide this down to third man and is beaten
driven into the off side
taken from off stump down to long-on
pushes a length ball to the off side

and he strikes first ball! Shall we give that wicket to Shaz as well? Faheem bangs his first ball in, Khawaja goes for the pull but can only splice it into the on side, mid-on comes around to complete the catch
back of a length at off stump, defended
driven off the back foot to deep cover
over the wicket, good length at off stump, defended to cover
hint of width outside off, square drives it into the ground and it bounces to backward point
beats backward point this time as he opens the face to a length delivery
taken from outside off down to long on
down the leg side, another wide
full at off stump, pushes forward
worked off the pads behind square
defended from off stump back to the bowler
tucks a straight delivery into midwicket
worked down the ground from outside off
back of a length, angled across on off stump, left alone and it shapes nicely through to the keeper
nicely bowled, a good-length delivery at the stumps, takes a thick outside edge to third man
width outside off but Finch mistimes his drive to the covers
back of a length at off stump, good line, defended to mid-on with hard hands
at off stump, this time Finch is able to push it straight enough of mid-on for the single
tucks a straight delivery into midwicket
beats the outside edge! A slingy delivery outside off which Marsh plays inside
driven to deep cover
pushed into the pads, Finch can't work it away to the leg side
touch fuller, flicked to deep square leg
shorter outside off, fired into the pitch, tapped through point
full at the stumps, pushed to the on side, Imad skips across to collect
tucked off the pads to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, pushed to cover
touch shorter, outside off, he's on the back foot and drives wide enough of deep cover for the second
works a straight delivery down to long leg
full outside off, he comes forward to drive and the bat twists in his hands, the ball runs through midwicket and they are able to make a second from it
good line, just outside off, left alone
full outside off, eases forward and drives to deep cover
fired in short, or slung in short, pushed to mid-on
slower and fuller to Finch, from round the wicket, pushed back to the bowler
into the pads, clipped to short fine leg
nicely put away, wrong line, pushed full outside leg stump and it just needs a tickle...Finch places it very fine this time
driven off the back foot to deep cover
back of a length on off, 137kph, he defends from the crease manipulating it to the gap at cover-point for a single
short onto the hip, it comes off the thigh pad as he tries to glance but it runs fine for a leg bye
back of a length, angled into middle, he tucks this with angle behind square, they push for two but they stop at one
good length, he pushes off the front foot with an open face to backward point, Imam fires at the non-strikers, hits the stumps and they get an overthrow from the ricochet. Needless throw
fuller on off, he drives straight back to the bowler
back of a length wide of off, he's up on his toes punching very nicely to deep point
good length outside off, he pushes this into the gap at cover, they push hard for two and run brilliantly to get it
fuller outside off, he leans forward and defends
pushed through, he gives room and cuts this hard but can't beat point
he places this one into the gap behind point and they get the one
pushed through outside off, he's back and punching firmly to deep cover-point
low full toss, he just bunts this, turning the face to angle it to the big gap at midwicket for a single
leg break first up, good length, he pushes on the front foot to cover
90kph leg break, off stump line, he has to defend on the front foot
he charges to a shorter ball, he adjusts and punches this to long on, they push for two but it's not on
89kph leg break, tight to off, he cuts from close to his body to backward point
top spinner on middle, he works this around his front pad behind square for a single
shorter leg break, he's back with ease punching this beautifully past point, he calls two straight away and gets it
fuller outside off, he drives straight of cover, Haris misfields diving to his left and can't prevent a single
leg stump line, he sits back and whips nicely wide of fine leg but can only get one as he got it too fine to press for a second
good length, off stump, he defends with an open face to place it behind point and they pinch one straight away
back of a length on off, he's back and working this straight to midwicket
bouncer, 136kph, Finch ducks under it and lets it pass. Well bowled
another short ball, Finch swivels and pulls from in front of face, he didn't middle it but it beats deep square for four! It hurried him but he controlled it enough with fast hands to find the gap.
full on leg stump, he whips this with the spin straight to square leg
fuller on off, he steps out and defends back to the bowler
he skips down to the pitch and clips this firmly to long on
shorter on leg, he sits back and works this forward of square for a single
good length on middle, he works this with the turn to square leg
looped up, he skips down and mistimes a drive to mid off but goes with the stroke for one. Abbas is inside the circle but could not stop that one
136kph, fuller length on off, he pushes off a thick inside edge to midwicket
full into middle, he defends on the front foot
142kph, speared into leg stump, it comes off pad and rolls fine for a leg bye, Finch has to stretch to beat the throw from the keeper
he misses his line, angled down leg, Finch tickles this fine with ease! Neatly done by the skipper. Amir is annoyed with himself
back of a length outside off, he opens the face and guides it to backward point
good length, angled into off, he punches from the crease straight to mid on
he skips down, it beats him in flight and spins into the pad, it rolls away behind square for a leg bye
leg break tossed up outside off, he pushes back to the bowler
shorter length outside off, he's back and waiting, cutting this through cover-point to the sweeper
quicker on middle, he clips this on the front foot to midwicket
flatter and pushed through, he's back and working this with the spin to deep forward square
slides this through on leg stump, Finch is back and working this behind square
back of a length on off, he's back and punching this back to the bowler
good length, angled into middle, he works this with the angle but straight to midwicket
this on leg stump, he sits back and whips this with the bottom hand through forward square to the sweeper
fuller angled into middle and leg, he glances this neatly with the angle to fine leg
back of a length outside off, he stands up and punches firmly but straight to cover. Finch is annoyed he couldn't find the gap there
shorter on the hip, he tries to pull but it comes off the thigh pad and runs behind square for a leg bye
he launches this up and over cover and it lands safe in the gap! It wasn't middle but he sliced it into the gap wide of long off
smashed straight down the ground! Top spinner too full, in the slot, he took a half step and cracked it straight down the ground for six! Sheer power from Finch.
full outside off, driven firmly straight to cover
looped up, with some turn, Finch dabs it with soft hands into the off side for one
tossed up, he skips out and drives past the bowler to straight long off
back of a length, he tries to punch off the back foot a little too square and drags it back to the bowler
beaten! Well bowled. Angled in back of a length, and nipping away, he tries to punch off the back foot square but is beaten but the seam movement
fuller into middle, he defends towards mid on and takes an easy one
veering into leg stump, he sits back and works this through forwards square to the sweeper
fuller on off, he mistimes a drive to mid off in the circle and takes the man on with a single and beats the throw from Umar Akmal easily
shorter and wider, he sits back and late cuts wide of third man but not wide enough to get two
angled down leg, it comes off the thigh pad and rolls fine for a leg bye
cracking pull shot through midwicket! It wasn't too short but he was back in a flash and crunching it through the gap at midwicket and the sweeper could not stop it
skips down the track and clips this to long on
hammered down the ground along the carpet straight of long on! What power! He swung from the crease, it was very full, but to beat the man at long on was incredible.
misses out on the sweep here. It pitched outside leg, he tried to sweep hard but it comes off the pad
shorter length, he is back and trying to cut but mistimes into the off side
shorter length, he punches off the back foot but can't beat mid on
slower ball, angled across the left-hander and he misses trying to cut
back of a length, he pushes this gently straight of mid on and takes one, Akmal fields and fires and nearly hits Marsh in the head! It was an accident. The throw was aimed at the keeper's end
angled into middle, he's back and working this through midwicket
shorter on middle, he's whipping this neatly straight to midwicket
glorious cover drive! On the up he smoked this. The man at cover got a hand on it but it was hit so well it went all the way to the rope
good length, leg stump, he's cramped for room defending

dropped! Caught and bowled chance. But it was hardly a chance. Finch hit this so hard! He didn't get a hand on it, it just hit him flush in the chest. That hurt him a bit. Goodness that was clubbed. Yasir is OK.
tossed up leg break, Finch reaches forward and pushes this to the gap at cover
he steps out and chips this neatly towards long on but well short of the man in the deep
good length leg break, he's back and just getting an outside edge as he's squared up defending! That nearly sneaked past and off stump was unprotected.
shorter on leg, he's back and working this through midwicket
shorter length, top spinner, it holds up in the surface, Marsh chips this off a leading edge up and over midwicket for a single
good length, on middle, he defends from the crease
play and miss trying to pull. It was fractionally short and he tried to hammer a pull but played over the top of it and it just missed the top of off stump
fuller on leg, he glances this easily to fine leg
good length, on middle, he works this to forward square for a single
shorter length across him, he late cuts off a thick bottom edge down to third man
short of a length outside off, he stands tall and plays a magnificent drive off the back foot through cover, Abbas runs from deep point but they get three
shorter leg break, he's back and cracking this firmly to long off
slower leg break, good length, he presses forward and gropes at it, defending off the thick inside edge
tossed up, he advances and whips firmly to deep midwicket
shorter length outside off, he cuts firmly to deep cover-point
good length leg break, he's caught on the crease but it able to clip this to the gap at midwicket
pushed through on middle, he's back and working this to midwicket but he wanted to get it squarer
beaten. This skidded straight on, Marsh tried to punch this square through cover-point but misses playing for turn
darted into leg stump, it hits him on the pad
pushed through again on leg, he clips this straight to midwicket
fuller and wider, he ins the ears back and drives hard but mistimes it to cover
flatter again on middle, he's trying to get this past midwicket for a single but can't beat the man
fired flat at middle and he punches back to the bowler
good length angled across, he sits back and defends to cover
yorker on middle, he does well to dig this out into the off side
full angled into leg, he ships this elegantly through square leg to the man in the deep
136kph, back of a length, he sits back and punches through the line to the sweeper at cover-point
launches this over mid on! Right in the slot and Marsh just plants the right leg and swings through the line lofting it down the ground and over the rope! Great shot.
full outside off, he steers this easily through extra cover for a couple
round the wicket, full at the stumps, played off the back foot which can be dangerous
back of a length, punched to deep cover
worked down the ground
speared in at the pads, misses everything and they take a run as well
powerful! He's laced that through the covers, pins the ears back and hammers a full delivery with a terrific drive
Amir just reads the spin to cut this off
full outside off, worked down the ground
over the wicket, back of a length, tucked to deep midwicket
back of a length at middle and off, defended to the bowler
deflects off the pad wide of the keeper
pushed up full at off stump, defended on the front foot
the bottom hand comes through the shot as he whips this from off stump wide of long-on
a slower ball, full outside off, steered down to third man
full at off stump from over the wicket, tapped to the bowler
plays back and works off the pads to deep midwicket
full and straight, pushed towards mid-on and midwicket is able to get across
outside leg stump, tucked along the ground
uses his feet, makes this into a very full delivery outside off and drives to deep cover
loses his line down the leg side, Imad angry with himself
he's lucky this time, full at the toes, Finch clips it straight to short fine leg
full and straight, plays with the turn as he flicks to deep midwicket
short outside off but he can't take advantage, driving to cover
just short of long-on! Finch trying for the hundred in grand style, coming down the pitch, but drags the shot and almost costs him
that's clean, though! Marsh shows his captain how to do it as skips down the pitch and lofts this miles over long-on
flicks this one along the ground having done the hard work
can't quite get it away at the moment as he mistimes this to cover
round the wicket, full at the stumps, worked down the ground
straight delivery, tucked into midwicket
hundred with a six! Finch launches this over deep midwicket with a clubbing blow. Some emotional in that celebration. The captain is back
tickled off the pads to deep square leg
bottom hand comes off the bat as he drives, thickish outside edge into backward point
tucked to deep square leg
full outside off, skews off an outside edge to short third man
outside leg stump, sent to deep square leg
short outside off, he rocks back and cracks to cover
length ball at off stump, Finch waits for it to spin and square drives to deep cover
worked into midwicket
short of a length outside off, played tong-off. All too easy for Australia
crunched! Into the stands again over deep midwicket. A dismissive blow from Finch, clubbing a full delivery off the stumps
full and straight, defended
that's well bowled, does him with the slower short ball, Finch through the shot
full at the stumps, driven to mid-off
a sweetly struck drive but straight to mid-off
another slower short ball, Marsh gets into a bit of a tangle but is able to deflect it into the leg side
round the wicket, Marsh comes down the pitch and swings this wide of long-on
dropped, that's a shambles from Pakistan, Finch bringing out another hefty blow, miscued it straight down the ground. It was a sitter for Imad at long-off
guided to third man
gets a bottom edge into the pitch as he looks to chop this away
drags a very short delivery from outside off, swings it towards long-on...Finch wants to finish this quickly
neatly worked from outside off to deep square
round the wicket, length ball outside off, gets a bottom edge as he tries to drive
worked off the pads to deep square
edged, and his gone! He had started to throw the bat after reach three figures, gives himself room, tries to flay it through the off side and gets an edge to the keeper. First ODI wicket for Abbas
good length outside off, Handscomb pushes hard into a defensive shot which finds cover
leading edge! But flies between point and cover...odd-looking shot, slicing across a back-of-a-length delivery
round the wicket, tight line at off stump, runs off the face to backward point
over the wicket, length outside off, pushed to point
short of a length outside off, pulled through midwicket and into a big gap
fuller, outside off, nice placement as he steers it wide of third man to allow an easy second
driven to cover...plays a lot of his shots 'on the walk'
angled in at the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
short of a length, pulled to deep square leg
dropped in his followthrough, but that would have a great snaffle by Abbas....Handscomb punched it back firmly to his left
chopped into the off side
shovels a good-length delivery to midwicket
goes fuller, straight, dug out through the covers to the sweeper
pushed wide of the cover sweeper, nice placement
straighter delivery, eased down to long-on
length delivery, driven down the ground
a short ball, pulled to deep midwicket
short of a length outside off, driven up and over the off side, a stand-and-deliver shot, out to deep cover
short again, straighter this time, he goes for the pull and gets taken on the back hip
full at the stumps, Marsh staying a touch leg side to given himself room to drive down the ground to long-off
back of a length, angled in, takes a thickish outside edge to long leg
full and straight, sweetly driven straight down the ground to bisect long-off and long-on
back of a length at off stump, slower ball, played to point
can't get this past cover
uses his feet, walks at the bowler, then clips through square leg
fuller, at the stumps, heaved through midwicket, long-on is able to get around
back of a length slower ball, Handscomb leans back, trying to give himself some room, drives to point
full outside leg stump, clubbed on the bounce to deep midwicket
follows the batsman as he moves outside leg, shovelled into the leg side and sluggish fielding allows a second
big full toss, again Handscomb moving outside leg, driven to deep cover
poor ball, full down the leg side...Rizwan suggests it clipped the pad. Nope, missed everything
back of a length outside off, hammered to long-off
short of a length outside off, driven into the covers
big full toss on the pads, swung to deep midwicket
short outside off, Marsh is almost through his shot too early and lobs it down the ground to long-off
full outside off, Handscomb in a very odd position as he fetches it down to long leg
goes for the yorker, it's a low full toss, just a single out to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, pushed into the covers without any real timing...they are doing it in singles
short of a length, goes for the pull and gets a big top edge which flies back over the keeper...just two needed now
and that's the victory! A full toss is clipped out to deep midwicket. They scamper back for the second, Handscomb brings the dive out
